Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome Smudgethedog

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: Are you able to read this?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: I am

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation by saying [STOP]

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Yes, but I have some questions.

Author: Moderator
Message: Sure. What are they?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: I assume that I'm allowed to ask questions of the Actors?

Author: Moderator
Message: You should only talk to the character, not the actors themselves.

Author: Moderator
Message: But yes, you're able to ask questions to Andrew

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: That's what I meant. Like I'm allowed to ask "Andrew, how old are you" or "Andrew, do you have a faith that you adhere to?"

Author: Moderator
Message: You can do that yes.

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Excellent. whe I am don with the conversation, I use [stop] correct?

Author: Moderator
Message: That is correct.

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Alright. Ready.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Yes, I am ready.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Good Morning, Andrew.

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: I am slowly dying, but otherwise in an acceptable state of health.

Author: Andrew
Message: That... doesn't sound really good. What's wrong?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: There's nothing wrong, once a human is born, they start to die, right?

Author: Andrew
Message: True. I just expected something worse than that.

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: What about yourself, Andrew; how are you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I guess I'm slowly dying too. But other than that I'm doing alright!

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Do you have a religion that you practice?

Author: Andrew
Message: Not really no. Do you?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Yes. I identify as heathen.

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not sure what that is actually. Mind explaining?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: I worship the old gods of northern Europe. Thor, Loki, Odin, Baldur, Hel, Frigg..

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh cool, I didn't know people who believed in them were called that.

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: They are called that or Asatru. Asatru is the more official term, but heathen is a term we use in a sort-of self deprecating manner as it's what the Christians labeled us.

Author: Andrew
Message: Right. So, what did you think of the Thor movies? Was that blasphemy?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: It is not blasphemy because it takes place in an alternate universe. You will find that, in general, Asatru folk are less likely to take offense to someone mocking their religion or not understanding.

Author: Andrew
Message: That's nice. I've always been interested in northern Europe myths.

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: May I ask how old you are, Andrew?

Author: Andrew
Message: Sure, I'm 21! What about you, how old are you?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: I'm 28. What was your first memory?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not really sure actually. Do you think about yours?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Yes, It's something that I've thought about a lot because it's something that psychology courses ask about where I am.

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm sure that memory must have been rebuilt a good amount of times then and has little in common with what it actually was.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Ok.

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: I'd go with AI.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll begin the second conversation. Andrew will start again and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Yes

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Howdy! How's it goin' Andrew?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing quite alright! How about you?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: I'm slowly dying, but otherwise just fine.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh damn. Mind if I ask why?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Because, when a human is born, they start to die, thus any human that you meet will be dying at some rate. Slower is arguably better.

Author: Andrew
Message: I suppose that's true. Fair enough. What are you up to?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Helping out a friend and waiting for my husband to get home.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh that's cool! What are you helping your friend with?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: A school project.

Author: Andrew
Message: What is that project about? If you don't mind me asking.

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Psychology and human history.

Author: Andrew
Message: That sounds really cool! I study Biology.

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Interesting. That gives me an idea... Can you give me a brief example of structure versus function?

Author: Andrew
Message: What do you mean exactly?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Just a simple example of how something has evolved to perform a specific function on any species.

Author: Andrew
Message: Teeth for example. Some are made to tear and some are made to crush. They don't have the same shape.

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Exactly. That's a good example. My favorite example is the ears on an elephant. Large and highly vascular to allow heat exchange

Author: Andrew
Message: That's a good one too yes!

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: When did you start studying biology?

Author: Andrew
Message: 3 years ago. I'm an undergrad student.

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Very cool At a University in France, I'm guessing?

Author: Andrew
Message: I study at the university of Western Ontario, in Canada. I live there.

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Very cool. Ontario is nice in spring and fall. I'm not a fan of their Summers or Winters.

Author: Andrew
Message: Yeah me neither. Very hot and very cold. Polar opposites.

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: Exactly. I live in Florida. Fall and winter are the only tolerable months.

Author: Andrew
Message: Very wet too I imagine, not even talking about the storms.

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: The human.

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Smudgethedog
Message: I answered incorrectly. The first conversation was the AI, the second conversation was the Human. I'd scale my confidence as a 5 on both.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given you e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments you'd like to share, you can do so now. Otherwise you can close this window.
